(NP Jesus ) (VP was ) (NP (NP _ David+`s[Saxon_Genitive] ) descendant ) (NP and (NP _ Abraham+`s[Saxon_Genitive] ) descendant ) . Title: Matthew writes Jesus' genealogy. This genealogy is the genealogy of Jesus Christ. Jesus was a descendant of David <<, who was the king of Israel,>> and a descendant of Abraham <<, who was the Jews' ancestor>>. Study Footnote: The Greek word 'Christ' is like the Hebrew word 'Messiah'. Those words mean 'the person that God anointed to become the leader who saved his people'.

Title: Jesus forces demons to leave two men. After Jesus <and the disciples> arrived in the region named Gadara, which was on the other side <<of the lake>>, two men who were possessed by demons came out from the tombs to Jesus. They were very violent. So no person was able to go on the road <<that was there>>.
